name: housekeeper
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person, especially a woman, whose job is to organize another person's house and deal with cooking, cleaning, etc.

Add to word list
Add to word list
a person, usually a woman, whose job is to take care of another person’s house, esp. by cleaning it
